install.name: Incomplete Information
install.author: Alain Rivest
install.copyright: Copyright Â© 2010-2012 Alain Rivest. All rights reserved.
install.description: Module to display a warning if the user didn't complete all the required informations in his Community Builder profile. Works with Joomla 1.5 and 2.5.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the module. This allows for individual module styling.

field.name: incomplete_info_field_type
field.label: Field Type
field.description: Show warning for which type of fields?
field.option: Show warning if there is empty REQUIRED fields
Show warning if there is empty fields VISIBLE on the profile page
Show warning if there is ANY empty fields in the user's profile
